Tools I am usingTools I am using

  • Currently I am using VS code. In highschool we were forced to work in NetBeans, but right after, when IDE was free choice I started working in atom and even tried Intelij. VS code was the best choice for me thanks to packages, that can be installed.
  • Only experience with different OS than Windows was in high school. In some classes we were supposed to work with Ubuntu, but it really didn't match my expectations and I just couldnt get used to different OS, than the one I was "working" with my entire life.
